entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regex caching strategy for RegexRunner turns allocation-free paths into allocating under contention #115082
  • `Enumerable.Chunk()` could reduce memory allocation without reducing its performance #115079
  • Vector512.Shuffle does not produce optimal codegen in some case #115078
  • Using an argument as a Vector variable causes data to be copied back and forth #115075
  • SmtpClientSendMailTest_SendAsync.MultipleRecipients_Failure_All test failure #115070

Closed

  • WaitForExitAsync hangs and leads to zombies process are created (Linux) #114847
  • Assert failure: pMD->IsCtor() #114933
    10.0.0
  • Exception Handling Problem with Null Function Pointer Invocation #115043
  • JIT: wrong result with Avx512BW.BlendVariable #114922
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug/Release generate different results #114572
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify 64-bit platform conditions #115083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Model partial defs less conservatively in liveness when possible #115081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: revise may/must point to stack analysis #115080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115077
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/9.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115076
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Special-case `vinserti*` when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Raspbian 10 #115071
    area-Infrastructure, runtime-mono

Merged

  • Cleanup some unused code and signature #112905
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115072
    needs-area-label
  • [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #114961
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Test Only] Fix Idn tests #115030
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Disable ctor calls on classes marked with `ComImport` when COM interop feature isn't enabled. #115009
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix last issue with GC bridge comparison and enable all tests #115049
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Update CentOS Stream, Debian, OpenSUSE #115027
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete redundant gcc-toolchain flag #115073
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [X86/Funclets] Fix uninitalized values in SoftwareExceptionFrame::UpdateContextFromTransitionBlock #115065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Fix Idn tests #115032
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.6
  • Fix typing of BlendVariableMask condition when optimizing TernaryLogic #114837
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • spmi collect/jitrollingbuild: Replace DefaultAzureCredential => AzureCliCredential #115067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • [clr-interp] Implement `CEE_LOCALLOC` and frame data allocator for dynamic stack allocations #114860
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: enhance dead stores for locals where all uses are useasg #115031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add VMOVD VMOVW APIs in JIT #115068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2696307 #115007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add PKCS#8, SPKI and PEM support for SLH-DSA #114943
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Build host.native for native AOT libraries testing #114764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm coreclr] Make clr.runtime+libs build on Windows #115058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • [Mono]: Make sure interpreter gc_transitions gets reset on managed exceptions. #115052
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add null check for EnumerationOptions #114672
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.6
